mosinstall.name: EZ Autos Random Listing
mosinstall.author: K.J. Strickland
mosinstall.description: This module shows a random EZ Autos vehicle listing.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Total Listings
param.description: The number of random listings to display at any one time (default is 5)

param.name: align
param.label: Horizontal Alignment
param.description: The horizontal alignment of image and text (default is center)

param.name: horizspace
param.label: Horizontal Space (px)
param.description: Horizontal space between image and next bit (default is 10)

param.name: colcount
param.label: Column Count
param.description: Number of columns across the page (default is 1)

param.name: colwidth
param.label: Column Width
param.description: Width of columns in terms of percentage - you must include the percentage sign (default is 100% for a single-column output)

param.name: slimbox2
param.label: Type of Image Display
param.description: Select what sort of image system to use with the previews

param.name: popwidth3
param.label: Popup Image Width (px)
param.description: Width to resize popup image to (default is 200 pixels wide)
